subject: Baseball
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: The condition of J. J. Putz’s right elbow and Carlos Delgado’s right hip leave the Mets without their eighth-inning reliever and their cleanup-hitting first baseman until at least Saturday.
snippet: The condition of J. J. Putz’s right elbow and Carlos Delgado’s right hip leave the Mets without their eighth-inning reliever and their cleanup-hitting first baseman until at least Saturday.
